title: NYC stabbing spree: Three killed in 'unprovoked' attacks, suspect arrested
content: A homeless man with a history of mental illness fatally stabbed three people and injured another in a series of unprovoked attacks across Manhattan. The suspect, 51-year-old Ramon Rivera, was apprehended by police after being spotted by bystanders. The incident has sparked outrage and calls for reform of the city's criminal justice and mental health systems.
summary: A homeless man with a history of mental illness fatally stabbed three people and injured another in a series of unprovoked attacks across Manhattan. The suspect, 51-year-old Ramon Rivera, was apprehended by police after being spotted by bystanders. The incident has sparked outrage and calls for reform of the city's criminal justice and mental health systems.

title: Australians urged to catch deadly funnel-web spiders for antivenom production
content: The Australian Reptile Park is urging Sydney residents to help collect deadly funnel-web spiders during their breeding season. The venom is crucial for producing life-saving antivenom, with each vial requiring approximately 150 spiders. Public contributions are vital to replenish venom supplies as male spiders have short lifespans.
summary: The Australian Reptile Park is urging Sydney residents to help collect deadly funnel-web spiders during their breeding season. The venom is crucial for producing life-saving antivenom, with each vial requiring approximately 150 spiders. Public contributions are vital to replenish venom supplies as male spiders have short lifespans.

title: Watch: When Donald Trump took to the WWE Ring to shave Linda McMahon's husband's head
content: Former wrestling executive Linda McMahon, 76, has been appointed by President-elect Donald Trump to lead the Education Department. The appointment underscores the long-standing relationship between Trump and the McMahon family, stemming from Trump's involvement with WWE in the late 1980s.
summary: Former wrestling executive Linda McMahon, 76, has been appointed by President-elect Donald Trump to lead the Education Department. The appointment underscores the long-standing relationship between Trump and the McMahon family, stemming from Trump's involvement with WWE in the late 1980s.

title: US embassy shuts down in Kyiv over likely 'significant air attack'
content: The US Embassy in Kyiv closed its doors and instructed staff to take cover following a warning about a potential large-scale Russian air attack. The alert was issued after Ukraine used US-supplied ATACMS missiles to attack Russian territory, escalating tensions between Russia and the West.
summary: The US Embassy in Kyiv closed its doors and instructed staff to take cover following a warning about a potential large-scale Russian air attack. The alert was issued after Ukraine used US-supplied ATACMS missiles to attack Russian territory, escalating tensions between Russia and the West.

title: Heated moment when Donald Trump's new press secretary, Karoline Leavitt, was kicked out of CNN
content: At 27, Karoline Leavitt, who started with humble beginnings, has been appointed as President-elect Donald Trump's press secretary. Leavitt previously worked with Kayleigh McEnany and gained recognition for her composed demeanour during a contentious CNN interview. Just days after giving birth, she expressed her dedication by returning to work, inspired by Trump's commitment after an assassination attempt at his rally.
summary: At 27, Karoline Leavitt, who started with humble beginnings, has been appointed as President-elect Donald Trump's press secretary.  Leavitt previously worked with Kayleigh McEnany and gained recognition for her composed demeanour during a contentious CNN interview.  Just days after giving birth, she expressed her dedication by returning to work, inspired by Trump's commitment after an assassination attempt at his rally.

title: 'Government should not be in possession': Court orders destruction of Sean Diddy Combs' jail cell notes
content: During a hearing concerning R. Kelly's case, the judge ordered the prosecution to return 19 pages of the singer's handwritten notes seized from his cell. Despite being labeled as 'legal' by Kelly, the prosecution argued these notes hinted at potential witness tampering. However, the judge assured that these allegations wouldn't affect the upcoming bail decision.
summary: During a hearing concerning R. Kelly's case, the judge ordered the prosecution to return 19 pages of the singer's handwritten notes seized from his cell.  Despite being labeled as 'legal' by Kelly, the prosecution argued these notes hinted at potential witness tampering. However, the judge assured that these allegations wouldn't affect the upcoming bail decision.

title: Bomb cyclone hits northwest US, causing major disruptions; power outages affect thousands
content: A powerful storm, classified as a "bomb cyclone", has slammed the northwest US, bringing hurricane-force winds and torrential rainfall. The storm threatens widespread power outages, coastal flooding, and hazardous conditions in mountainous areas. Thousands are already without power as the region braces for the most severe atmospheric river of the season.
summary: A powerful storm, classified as a "bomb cyclone", has slammed the northwest US, bringing hurricane-force winds and torrential rainfall. The storm threatens widespread power outages, coastal flooding, and hazardous conditions in mountainous areas. Thousands are already without power as the region braces for the most severe atmospheric river of the season.

title: Who is Linda McMahon, former WWE CEO chosen by Trump as education secretary
content: Former professional wrestling executive and head of the Small Business Administration during Trump's first term, Linda McMahon, has been tapped to lead the department of education. McMahon, a proponent of universal school choice, previously served on the Connecticut Board of Education and has been actively involved in promoting Trump's policies.
summary: Former professional wrestling executive and head of the Small Business Administration during Trump's first term, Linda McMahon, has been tapped to lead the department of education.  McMahon, a proponent of universal school choice, previously served on the Connecticut Board of Education and has been actively involved in promoting Trump's policies.

'Not enough to prevail': Zelenskyy warns of Ukraine's possible loss without US aid
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy expressed anxiety over potential US military funding cuts, warning it could lead to defeat against Russia. His statement comes amid internal US debates on Ukraine's financial support, fueled by President-elect Donald Trump's skepticism. Zelenskyy emphasized the importance of US-Ukraine unity and Trump's potential influence on Putin to end the conflict.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy expressed anxiety over potential US military funding cuts, warning it could lead to defeat against Russia. His statement comes amid internal US debates on Ukraine's financial support, fueled by President-elect Donald Trump's skepticism. Zelenskyy emphasized the importance of US-Ukraine unity and Trump's potential influence on Putin to end the conflict.

Is America ready for a woman president? Bill Clinton suggests conservatives may have an edge
content: Former US President Bill Clinton shared his perspective on the possibility of a female US president, suggesting that while the nation might be ready, a conservative candidate might have an easier path to victory. He reflected on the challenges faced by female candidates and drew parallels with Margaret Thatcher's success.
summary: Former US President Bill Clinton shared his perspective on the possibility of a female US president, suggesting that while the nation might be ready, a conservative candidate might have an easier path to victory. He reflected on the challenges faced by female candidates and drew parallels with Margaret Thatcher's success.

title: Do the Donald! Trump's signature dance finds its way into US sports world
Will Donald Trump stick with Matt Gaetz as attorney general? Here's what he said
content: President-elect Donald Trump has reaffirmed his decision to appoint Matt Gaetz as attorney general despite an ongoing investigation into sex trafficking allegations against him. Gaetz, who recently resigned from Congress, faces scrutiny from the House Ethics Committee, with several Senate Republicans demanding the release of their findings before his confirmation.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump has reaffirmed his decision to appoint Matt Gaetz as attorney general despite an ongoing investigation into sex trafficking allegations against him.  Gaetz, who recently resigned from Congress, faces scrutiny from the House Ethics Committee, with several Senate Republicans demanding the release of their findings before his confirmation.
